description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b67on","text":"This protocol describes the seeding, fixation and staining of samples for immunofluorescent visualization of ATP13A2 and CD63. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2uclh","text":"4% paraformaldehyde (Thermo Fisher Scientific): J61899","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qfvs","text":"BSA (Roth): 8076.4","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fglsd","text":"Saponin (Sigma): S-2149","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blqv7","text":"anti-ATP13A2 (Sigma): A3361","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81sfk","text":"anti-CD63 (ExBio): 11-343-C100","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q7re","text":"alexa-488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (Invitrogen): R37116","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjj43","text":"alexa-594 goat anti-mouse IgG (Invitrogen): A11005","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e58n8","text":"DAPI (Sigma): D9542","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nm4","text":"FluorSave (Merck): 345789-20ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5o4v0","text":"Seed cells: 75 000 cells/well (SH-SY5Y) in a 12-well plate with coverslips. Allow the cells to attach and grow for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f1le5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"45c3i","text":"Wash the cells twice with ice-cold PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jij1","text":"Permeabilization and blocking with a mixture of 5% BSA (Roth) and 0.5% saponin (Sigma) (diluted in PBS) (referred to as blocking buffer) for   on a shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9tsaj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uaof","text":"Incubate with primary antibody (anti-ATP13A2, A3361, Sigma; anti-CD63, 11-343-C100, ExBio) (diluted 1/200 in blocking buffer) for   (40 µl antibody mixture is sufficient per coverslip in a wet chamber). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6vkfh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1ugi","text":"Incubate the samples in secondary antibody (alexa-488 goat anti-rabbit IgG R37116, Invitrogen; alexa-594 goat anti-mouse IgG, A11005, Invitrogen) (diluted 1/1000 in blocking buffer) for   on a shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":186,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ecag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77kjc","text":"Incubate the samples in 200 ng/ml DAPI (D9542, Sigma) for   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8av35","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Immunofluorescence of ATP13A2 and CD63
